v8:item.v8:content: Goods, materials, semi-finished products, investments, works, services, technological operations, and third party services.
Line of business defines the GL accounts for revenue, COGS and retained earnings
Product description to display on print forms
Whenever you purchase a service or consume a product, its cost will be recorded to this account
Is used to calculate the shipment date in a sales order. To enable it, press "More actions" on the top right corner of a sales order, and choose Settings.
Price group divides products for pricing purposes. You can set a price group as a condition for discount applying, or you can set and print price lists separately for different price groups.
A particular group of related products. You can specify a set of additional attributes for each category.
Is used for fast search and displayed in print forms
Standard time to perform operation in hours
Keep accounting of products by batches (expiration date, production date) Also it defines the ownership: own inventory, contractor's raw materials, consigned goods, safekeeping.
Keep accounting of products by characteristics (such as color and size).
Full text of additional attribute of string type
